Sephora Collection Overnight Hydrating Mask

Brand: Sephora

Category: Mask

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Betaine, Methylpropanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, 1,2-Hexanediol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Carbomer, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Phytate, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Tocopherol, Polyglutamic Acid
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
